MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This mapping loads data in the S_TXN_RECON_HIST which is aggregated on the basis of S_PROCESSED_BILING_CYCLE.ID
MAPPING.NAME: m_S_TXN_RECON_HIST_LOAD

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This source qualifier fetches the record counts, sum of amounts,distinct contracts from all product parts at stage layer which has been aggregated on the basis of S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE.ID and table names.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_STG_SUCCESS

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This Column has been generated because the HOPM.TP in Gift os not same as VALUE.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: STG_TP_SUCCESS

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This Column has been generated because the HOPM.TP in Gift os not same as VALUE.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: STG_TP_CA_GENERATED

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
Select B.BILL_CYCLE_ID,B.DPI_ENVIRONMENT,A.TAB_NAME, NVL(count(CASE WHEN A.CA_GENERATED=0 then 1 end),0) STG_COUNT_SUCCESS_NCA, NVL(count(CASE WHEN A.CA_GENERATED<>0 then 1 end),0) STG_COUNT_CA_GENERATED, NVL(COUNT(distinct B.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY),0) STG_CONTRACTS_SUCCESS, NVL(COUNT(CASE WHEN A.SQ_FILTER=1 then 1 end),0) HOPM_COUNT_SQ, SUM(NVL(CASE WHEN A.CA_GENERATED=0 then A.AMOUNT end,0)) STG_AMOUNT_SUCCESS, SUM(NVL(CASE WHEN A.CA_GENERATED<>0 then A.AMOUNT end,0)) STG_AMOUNT_CA_GENERATED, SUM(NVL(CASE WHEN A.CA_GENERATED=0 AND A.SQ_FILTER =1 then A.TP end,0)) STG_TP_SUCCESS, SUM(NVL(CASE WHEN A.CA_GENERATED<>0 AND A.SQ_FILTER =1 then A.TP end,0)) STG_TP_CA_GENERATED from (SELECT 'GIFT' TAB_NAME,DPI_CONTRACT_KEY,VALUE as AMOUNT, case when cg.EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE' AND C.PROF_MAP_CD = 'CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE' AND C.REDMPT_PCT is not null then C.REDMPT_PCT* CG.VALUE when CG.EVENT_TYPE='CAPTURE' AND c.PROF_MAP_CD = 'CASH_EQUIVALENT_CAPTURE' AND C.REDMPT_PCT is null then cg.VALUE else 0 end as TP, CA_GENERATED,CASE WHEN C.PROF_MAP_CD like '%CAPTURE%' AND CG.EVENT_TYPE<>'DISQUALIFY' then 1 else 0 END AS SQ_FILTER FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT CG LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_MST_PRD_CATLG C ON CG.PRD_CATLG_KEY = C.PRD_CATLG_KEY AND CG.IN_DATE BETWEEN C.EFFEC_STRT_DATE AND C.EFFEC_END_DATE WHERE PROCESS_CYCLE=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID UNION ALL SELECT 'PRODUCT',PRD.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY,PRD.CHARGE_AMOUNT,CASE WHEN (TEMP.PROF_MAP_CD='INSTALL_ACT_FEE_MATERIAL_RIGHT' OR TEMP.PROF_MAP_CD='INSTALL_FEE_POB') AND PRD.ACTIVITY_FLAG='I' AND TEMP.DURATION IS NOT NULL then TEMP.DURATION*PRD.CHARGE_AMOUNT WHEN (TEMP.PROF_MAP_CD='INSTALL_ACT_FEE_MATERIAL_RIGHT' OR TEMP.PROF_MAP_CD='INSTALL_FEE_POB') AND PRD.ACTIVITY_FLAG='O' AND TEMP.DURATION IS NOT NULL then PRD.CHARGE_AMOUNT*MONTHS_BETWEEN(TEMP.OUT_DATE,TEMP.IN_DATE) ELSE PRD.CHARGE_AMOUNT END AS TP,0,1 FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT PRD LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.TEMP_CPPH_HIST_DELTA_PRODUCT temp ON PRD.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY=temp.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY AND PRD.PRD_CATLG_KEY=temp.PRD_CATLG_KEY AND PRD.USI=temp.USI AND PRD.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER=temp.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' UNION ALL
SELECT 'TAX',DPI_CONTRACT_KEY,AMOUNT,AMOUNT,CA_GENERATED,CASE WHEN AMOUNT<>0 AND (NVL(CPPH.ETL_CYCLE_ID,TMP.ETL_CYCLE_ID)=MAX(NVL(CPPH.ETL_CYCLE_ID,TMP.ETL_CYCLE_ID)) OVER (PARTITION BY NVL(CPPH.CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER,TMP.CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER)) )then 1 else 0 end FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_TAX_OR_SRCHRG TAX --WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST CPPH ON CPPH.DELTA_OR_MONTHLY='DELTA' AND CPPH.STG_TABLE_NAME IN ('S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT','S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO','S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION' ) AND ( (CPPH.STG_TABLE_NAME IN ('S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT','S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO') AND CPPH.CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER= TO_CHAR(TAX.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY)|| '-' ||TO_CHAR(TAX.PRD_CATLG_KEY)|| '-' ||TO_CHAR(TAX.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER) || '-' ||TO_CHAR(TAX.USI) ) OR (CPPH.STG_TABLE_NAME='S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION' AND CPPH.CPPH_CON_PROD_PART_NUMBER=TO_CHAR(TAX.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY)|| '-' ||TO_CHAR(TAX.RELATED_PRODUCT)|| '-' ||TO_CHAR(TAX.USI)||'-' ||TO_CHAR(TAX.PROMO_ID)||'-' || TO_CHAR(TAX.PROMO_KEY)||'-'||TO_CHAR(TAX.PROMO_SEQUENCE) ) ) AND CASE WHEN CPPH.STG_TABLE_NAME='S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT' THEN 'P' WHEN CPPH.STG_TABLE_NAME='S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO' THEN 'R' WHEN CPPH.STG_TABLE_NAME='S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION' THEN 'O' END =TAX.SOURCE_TAX_TYPE LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST_REV_ADJ_TEMP TMP ON TMP.CPPH_CONTRACT_NUMBER= TO_CHAR(TAX.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) AND TMP.SOURCE_TRANSACTION_ID=TO_CHAR(TAX.SOURCE_TRANSACTION_ID) AND TMP.ETL_CYCLE_ID=TAX.ETL_CYCLE_ID AND TAX.SOURCE_TAX_TYPE='A' WHERE TAX.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' AND TAX.ETL_CYCLE_ID = $$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND TAX.CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' UNION ALL SELECT 'PROMOTION',DPI_CONTRACT_KEY,DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,CA_GENERATED,CASE WHEN DISCOUNT_AMOUNT<>0 then 1 else 0 end FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' UNION ALL SELECT 'REVENUE',DPI_CONTRACT_KEY,AMOUNT,AMOUNT,CA_GENERATED,CASE WHEN AMOUNT<>0 then 1 else 0 end FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_REVENUE_ADJ WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' UNION ALL SELECT 'REWARD',DPI_CONTRACT_KEY,AMOUNT,AMOUNT,CA_GENERATED,1--CASE WHEN AMOUNT<>0 then 1 else 0 end FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' ) A INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUST_CONTRACT_BILL_HIST B on A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY=B.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY AND B.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE PBC ON PBC.ID=B.BILL_CYCLE_ID AND PBC.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID GROUP by B.BILL_CYCLE_ID,B.DPI_ENVIRONMENT,A.TAB_NAME

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Update Strategy to collect ports and mark them as INSERT
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: UPD_COLLECT_CONTRACT

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Source Qualifier for S_PBC to stamp contract summary line in the RECON_HIST Table
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE_CONTRACT

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: Select PBC.ID , PBC.ENVIRONMENT, PBC.BILLING_CYCLE, PBC.BILL_DATE, PBC.DPI_PROCESSED, PBC.STANDARDIZATION_PROCESSED, PBC.CYCLE_BEGIN, PBC.CYCLE_END, COUNT(distinct C.DPI_CONTRACT_ID) STD_CONTRACTS_PROCESSED, COUNT(distinct PC.DPI_CONTRACT_ID) PS_CONTRACTS_PROCESSED, COUNT(distinct SC.DPI_CONTRACT_ID) STG_CONTRACTS_PROCESSED, COUNT(distinct SCE.DPI_CONTRACT_ID) STG_CONTRACTS_ERRORED, COUNT(distinct case when NVL(CH.ETL_CYCLE_ID,0)>0 then CH.CONH_GROUPING_KEY end) HOPM_CONTRACTS_PROCESSED, COUNT(distinct case when NVL(CH.ETL_CYCLE_ID,0)<0 then CH.CONH_GROUPING_KEY end) HOPM_CONTRACTS_ERRORED from $$STD_SCHEMA.CONTRACT C INNER JOIN $$STD_SCHEMA.CUSTOMER on CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_ID= C.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE PBC ON CUSTOMER.BILL_CYCLE_ID = PBC.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.PS_TXN_CONTRACT PC ON PC.CONTRACT_ID= C.CONTRACT_ID and PC.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT SC ON SC.STD_CONTRACT_ID= PC.CONTRACT_ID and SC.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID and SC.ACTIVITY_FLAG<>'O' and SC.CURRENT_FLAG='Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_ERROR SCE ON SCE.CONTRACT_ID= C.CONTRACT_ID and SCE.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONH_HIST CH ON CH.CONH_GROUPING_KEY= SC.DPI_CONTRACT_ID and abs(CH.ETL_CYCLE_ID)=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID and CH.DELTA_OR_MONTHLY='DELTA' WHERE PBC.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID GROUP by PBC.ID , PBC.ENVIRONMENT, PBC.BILLING_CYCLE, PBC.BILL_DATE, PBC.DPI_PROCESSED, PBC.STANDARDIZATION_PROCESSED, PBC.CYCLE_BEGIN, PBC.CYCLE_END ORDER BY PBC.ID

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This source qualifier fetches the record counts, sum of amounts,distinct contracts from all product parts at pre-stage layer which has been aggregated on the basis of S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE.ID and table names
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_PBC_PS

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: Select PBC.ID, A.TAB_NAME,NVL(count(1),0) PS_TOTAL_COUNT, NVL(COUNT(distinct CONTRACT.CONTRACT_ID),0) PS_DIST_CONTRACTS,SUM(NVL(AMOUNT,0) )PS_AMOUNT,PBC.BILL_DATE,PBC.ENVIRONMENT,PBC.BILLING_CYCLE from (SELECT 'GIFT' TAB_NAME,CONTRACT_ID,VALUE as AMOUNT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.PS_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT CG UNION ALL SELECT 'PRODUCT',CONTRACT_ID,CHARGE_AMOUNT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.PS_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT UNION ALL SELECT 'TAX',CONTRACT_ID,AMOUNT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.PS_TXN_CONTRACT_TAX_OR_SRCHRG UNION ALL SELECT 'PROMOTION',CONTRACT_ID,DISCOUNT_AMOUNT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.PS_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION UNION ALL SELECT 'REVENUE',CONTRACT_ID,AMOUNT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.PS_TXN_CONTRACT_REVENUE_ADJ UNION ALL SELECT 'REWARD',CONTRACT_ID,AMOUNT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.PS_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO) A LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.PS_TXN_CONTRACT CONTRACT on A.CONTRACT_ID=CONTRACT.CONTRACT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.PS_TXN_CUSTOMER CUSTOMER on CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_ID= CONTRACT.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE PBC ON CUSTOMER.BILL_CYCLE_ID = PBC.ID AND PBC.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID GROUP by A.TAB_NAME,PBC.ID,PBC.BILL_DATE,PBC.ENVIRONMENT,PBC.BILLING_CYCLE ORDER BY PBC.ID, A.TAB_NAME

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: A pass through expression between SQ and target
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_HOPM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Following columns are updated: HOPM_TOTAL_COUNT HOPM_DIST_CONTRACTS HOPM_AMOUNT
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: UPD_S_RECONCILIATION_HIST_HOPM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This updates STG_COUNT_SUCCESS_NCA STG_COUNT_CA_GENERATED STG_CONTRACTS_SUCCESS HOPM_COUNT_SQ STG_AMOUNT_SUCCESS STG_AMOUNT_CA_GENERATED STG_TP_SUCCESS STG_TP_CA_GENERATED attributes
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: UPD_S_RECONCILIATION_HIST_STG_SUCCESS

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This Column has been generated because the HOPM.TP in Gift os not same as VALUE.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: STG_TP_CA_GENERATED

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: A pass through expression between SQ and target
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_COLLECT_PORTS_STG

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This Column has been generated because the HOPM.TP in Gift os not same as VALUE.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: STG_TP_CA_GENERATED

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This source qualifier fetches the record counts, sum of amounts and distinct contracts from all product parts error tables at pre-stage layer which has been aggregated on the basis of S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE.ID and table names
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_STG_ERROR

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: WITH CONTRACT_CHILD_ERR AS (SELECT 'GIFT' TAB_NAME,CONTRACT_ID,VALUE as AMOUNT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT_ERROR CG WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID UNION ALL SELECT 'PRODUCT',CONTRACT_ID,CHARGE_AMOUNT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT_ERROR WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID UNION ALL SELECT 'TAX',CONTRACT_ID,AMOUNT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_TAX_OR_SRCH_ERR WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID UNION ALL SELECT 'PROMOTION',CONTRACT_ID,DISCOUNT_AMOUNT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION_ERROR WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID UNION ALL SELECT 'REVENUE',CONTRACT_ID,AMOUNT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_REV_ADJ_ERROR WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID UNION ALL SELECT 'REWARD',CONTRACT_ID,AMOUNT FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_REW_OR_AUTO_ERR WHERE ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID) (Select PBC.ID,PBC.ENVIRONMENT, A.TAB_NAME, NVL(count(A.CONTRACT_ID),0) STG_COUNT_ERROR, NVL(COUNT(distinct case when ERR.ETL_CYCLE_ID <1 then ERR.CONTRACT_ID end),0)STG_ERRORED_CONTRACTS,SUM(NVL(A.AMOUNT,0)) STG_AMOUNT_ERROR,NVL(COUNT(distinct A.CONTRACT_ID),0)STAGE_CONTRACT_IN_ERRORS from CONTRACT_CHILD_ERR A INNER JOIN PS_TXN_CONTRACT ERR ON A.CONTRACT_ID=ERR.CONTRACT_ID AND abs(ERR.ETL_CYCLE_ID)=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID INNER JOIN PS_TXN_CUSTOMER CUS ON CUS.CUSTOMER_ID=ERR.CUSTOMER_ID Left OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE PBC ON PBC.ID=CUS.BILL_CYCLE_ID AND PBC.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID GROUP by PBC.ID,PBC.ENVIRONMENT,A.TAB_NAME)

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This will update the following columns: STG_CHILD_ERROR_COUNT STG_ERRORED_CONTRACTS STG_CHILD_ERROR_AMOUNT STG_DIST_CONTRACT_IN_CHILD_ERR
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: UPD_S_RECON_HIST_STG_ERROR

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This source qualifier fetches the record counts, sum of amounts,distinct contracts from all product parts at standardization layer which has been aggregated on the basis of S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE.ID and table names
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_PBC_STD

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: Select PBC.ID, PBC.ENVIRONMENT, PBC.BILLING_CYCLE, PBC.BILL_DATE, PBC.DPI_PROCESSED, PBC.STANDARDIZATION_PROCESSED,PBC.CYCLE_BEGIN, PBC.CYCLE_END, PBC.ETL_CYCLE_ID ,A.TAB_NAME, NVL(count(1),0) STD_TOTAL_COUNT, NVL(COUNT(distinct CONTRACT.DPI_CONTRACT_ID),0) STD_DIST_CONTRACTS,SUM(NVL(A.AMOUNT,0)) STD_AMOUNT from (SELECT 'GIFT' TAB_NAME,CONTRACT_ID,VALUE as AMOUNT FROM $$STD_SCHEMA.CONTRACT_GIFT CG UNION ALL SELECT 'PRODUCT',CONTRACT_ID,CHARGE_AMOUNT FROM $$STD_SCHEMA.CONTRACT_PRODUCT UNION ALL SELECT 'TAX',CONTRACT_ID,AMOUNT FROM $$STD_SCHEMA.CONTRACT_TAX_OR_SURCHARGE UNION ALL SELECT 'PROMOTION',CONTRACT_ID,DISCOUNT_AMOUNT FROM $$STD_SCHEMA.CONTRACT_PROMOTION UNION ALL SELECT 'REVENUE',CONTRACT_ID,AMOUNT FROM $$STD_SCHEMA.CONTRACT_REVENUE_ADJUSTMENT UNION ALL SELECT 'REWARD',CONTRACT_ID,AMOUNT FROM $$STD_SCHEMA.CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO_CHARGE) A INNER JOIN $$STD_SCHEMA.CONTRACT ON A.CONTRACT_ID=CONTRACT.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN $$STD_SCHEMA.CUSTOMER on CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_ID= CONTRACT.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE PBC ON CUSTOMER.BILL_CYCLE_ID = PBC.ID WHERE PBC.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID GROUP by PBC.ID, PBC.ENVIRONMENT, PBC.BILLING_CYCLE, PBC.BILL_DATE, PBC.DPI_PROCESSED, PBC.STANDARDIZATION_PROCESSED,PBC.CYCLE_BEGIN, PBC.CYCLE_END, PBC.ETL_CYCLE_ID,A.TAB_NAME ORDER BY PBC.ID,A.TAB_NAME

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: A pass through expression between SQ and target
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_COLLECT_ERROR_PORTS

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This source qualifier fetches the record counts, sum of amounts from all product parts at hopper mirror layer which has been aggregated on the basis of S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE.ID and table names
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_HOPM

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select bh.BILL_CYCLE_ID,bh.DPI_ENVIRONMENT, CASE WHEN cpph.STG_TABLE_NAME ='S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT' then 'PRODUCT' WHEN cpph.STG_TABLE_NAME ='S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION' then 'PROMOTION' WHEN cpph.STG_TABLE_NAME ='S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO' then 'REWARD' WHEN cpph.STG_TABLE_NAME ='S_TXN_CONTRACT_REVENUE_ADJ' then 'REVENUE' WHEN cpph.STG_TABLE_NAME ='S_TXN_CONTRACT_TAX_OR_SRCHRG' then 'TAX' WHEN cpph.STG_TABLE_NAME ='S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT' then 'GIFT' end as TAB_NAME, NVL(COUNT(cpph.CPPH_CONTRACT_NUMBER),0) HOPM_TOTAL_COUNT, NVL(COUNT( CASE WHEN CONH.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID THEN conh.CONH_CONTRACT_NUMBER END),0 ) HOPM_QUALIFIED_COUNT, NVL(COUNT( CASE WHEN CONH.ETL_CYCLE_ID=-$$ETL_CYCLE_ID THEN conh.CONH_CONTRACT_NUMBER END),0 )HOPM_DISQUALIFIED_COUNT, SUM(NVL( CASE WHEN CPPH.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID THEN cpph.CPPH_MONTHLY_CHARGE END,0)) HOPM_QUALIFIED_AMOUNT, SUM(NVL( CASE WHEN CPPH.ETL_CYCLE_ID=-$$ETL_CYCLE_ID THEN cpph.CPPH_MONTHLY_CHARGE END,0)) HOPM_DISQUALIFIED_AMOUNT, SUM(NVL(CPPH_MONTHLY_CHARGE,0 )) HOPM_TOTAL_AMOUNT, NVL(COUNT(distinct CASE WHEN CONH.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID THEN conh.CONH_CONTRACT_NUMBER END),0 ) HOPM_QUALIFIED_CONTRACTS, NVL(COUNT( distinct CASE WHEN CONH.ETL_CYCLE_ID=-$$ETL_CYCLE_ID THEN conh.CONH_CONTRACT_NUMBER END),0 ) HOPM_DISQUALIFIED_CONTRACTS from $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUST_CONTRACT_BILL_HIST bh INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONH_HIST conh ON conh.CONH_CONTRACT_NUMBER=to_char(bh.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY) and conh.ETL_CYCLE_ID In ($$ETL_CYCLE_ID,-$$ETL_CYCLE_ID) INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST cpph ON conh.CONH_CONTRACT_NUMBER=cpph.CPPH_CONTRACT_NUMBER and cpph.ETL_CYCLE_ID In ($$ETL_CYCLE_ID,-$$ETL_CYCLE_ID) and CPPH.DELTA_OR_MONTHLY='DELTA' group by bh.BILL_CYCLE_ID, bh.ETL_CYCLE_ID,bh.DPI_ENVIRONMENT, CASE WHEN cpph.STG_TABLE_NAME ='S_TXN_CONTRACT_PRODUCT' then 'PRODUCT' WHEN cpph.STG_TABLE_NAME ='S_TXN_CONTRACT_PROMOTION' then 'PROMOTION' WHEN cpph.STG_TABLE_NAME ='S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO' then 'REWARD' WHEN cpph.STG_TABLE_NAME ='S_TXN_CONTRACT_REVENUE_ADJ' then 'REVENUE' WHEN cpph.STG_TABLE_NAME ='S_TXN_CONTRACT_TAX_OR_SRCHRG' then 'TAX' WHEN cpph.STG_TABLE_NAME ='S_TXN_CONTRACT_GIFT' then 'GIFT' end

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: A pass through expression between SQ and target
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_COLLECT_PORTS_PS

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: In the first pipeline records from PS and STD will be inserted into S_TXN_RECON_HIST
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: UPD_S_RECONCILIATION_HIST_PS

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: performs a full outerJoin on the data from the preceeding source qualifier on the basis of ID and TABLE_NAMES
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: JNR_PBC_STD_TO_PS

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Source Qualifier for S_TXN_RECON_HIST to stamp contract summary(Header) line back in the RECON_HIST Table
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_S_TXN_RECON_HIST

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT A.BILL_CYCLE_ID, SUM(A.STD_AMOUNT) STD_AMOUNT, SUM(A.PS_AMOUNT) PS_AMOUNT, SUM(A.STG_AMOUNT_SUCCESS) STG_AMOUNT_SUCCESS, SUM(A.STG_AMOUNT_CA_GENERATED) STG_AMOUNT_CA_GENERATED, SUM(A.STG_TP_SUCCESS) STG_TP_SUCCESS, SUM(A.STG_TP_CA_GENERATED) STG_TP_CA_GENERATED, SUM(A.STG_CHILD_ERROR_AMOUNT) STG_CHILD_ERROR_AMOUNT, SUM(A.HOPM_QUALIFIED_AMOUNT) HOPM_QUALIFIED_AMOUNT, SUM(A.HOPM_DISQUALIFIED_AMOUNT) HOPM_DISQUALIFIED_AMOUNT, SUM(A.HOPM_TOTAL_AMOUNT ) HOPM_TOTAL_AMOUNT, SUM(A.STD_TOTAL_COUNT ) STD_TOTAL_COUNT, SUM(A.PS_TOTAL_COUNT ) PS_TOTAL_COUNT, SUM(A.STG_COUNT_SUCCESS_NCA ) STG_COUNT_SUCCESS_NCA, SUM(A.STG_COUNT_CA_GENERATED ) STG_COUNT_CA_GENERATED, SUM(A.STG_CHILD_ERROR_COUNT ) STG_CHILD_ERROR_COUNT, SUM(A.HOPM_COUNT_SQ ) HOPM_COUNT_SQ, SUM(A.HOPM_TOTAL_COUNT ) HOPM_TOTAL_COUNT, SUM(A.HOPM_QUALIFIED_COUNT ) HOPM_QUALIFIED_COUNT, SUM(A.HOPM_DISQUALIFIED_COUNT ) HOPM_DISQUALIFIED_COUNT, SUM(A.STG_DIST_CONTRACT_IN_CHILD_ERR ) STG_DIST_CONTRACT_IN_CHILD_ERR FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_RECON_HIST A where A.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID GROUP BY A.BILL_CYCLE_ID ORDER BY A.BILL_CYCLE_ID

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Expression to collect ports
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_COLLECT_CONTRACT

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Joiner to collect Counts and Amounts for the Summary Line
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: JNR_COLLECT_CONTRACT_LINE

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Expression for S_TXN_RECON_HIST to stamp contract summary(Header) line back in the RECON_HIST Table
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_COLLECT_CONTRACT_CPPs_AND_AMOUNTS

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Expression for S_PBC to stamp contract summary line in the RECON_HIST Table
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_COLLECT_CONTRACT_COUNTS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Target Definition to Insert Summary line for CONTRACTS in RECON Hist
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_S_TXN_RECON_HIST_CONTRACT_LINE

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Target instance to update records into S_TXN_RECON_HIST for HOPM layer
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_S_PS_RECONCILIATION_HIST_HOPM

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Target instance to update records into S_TXN_RECON_HIST for stage layer for all successful records
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_S_PS_RECONCILIATION_HIST_STG_SUCCESS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Target instance to update records into S_TXN_RECON_HIST for stage layer for all errored out records
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_S_PS_RECONCILIATION_HIST_STG_ERROR

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Target instance to insert records into S_TXN_RECON_HIST
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_S_PS_RECONCILIATION_HIST_PS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Expression for S_PBC to stamp contract summary line in the RECON_HIST Table
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_COLLECT_CONTRACT_COUNTS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Expression for S_TXN_RECON_HIST to stamp contract summary(Header) line back in the RECON_HIST Table
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_COLLECT_CONTRACT_CPPs_AND_AMOUNTS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Joiner to collect Counts and Amounts for the Summary Line
INSTANCE.NAME: JNR_COLLECT_CONTRACT_LINE

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Expression to collect ports
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_COLLECT_CONTRACT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Source Qualifier for S_TXN_RECON_HIST to stamp contract summary(Header) line back in the RECON_HIST Table
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_SC_S_TXN_RECON_HIST

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: performs a full outerJoin on the data from the preceeding source qualifier on the basis of ID and TABLE_NAMES
INSTANCE.NAME: JNR_PBC_STD_TO_PS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: In the first pipeline records from PS and STD will be inserted into S_TXN_RECON_HIST
INSTANCE.NAME: UPD_S_RECONCILIATION_HIST_PS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: A pass through expression between SQ and target
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_COLLECT_PORTS_PS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This source qualifier fetches the record counts, sum of amounts from all product parts at hopper mirror layer which has been aggregated on the basis of S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE.ID and table names
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_SC_HOPM

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: A pass through expression between SQ and target
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_COLLECT_ERROR_PORTS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This source qualifier fetches the record counts, sum of amounts,distinct contracts from all product parts at standardization layer which has been aggregated on the basis of S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE.ID and table names
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_SC_PBC_STD

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This will update the following columns: STG_CHILD_ERROR_COUNT STG_ERRORED_CONTRACTS STG_CHILD_ERROR_AMOUNT STG_DIST_CONTRACT_IN_CHILD_ERR
INSTANCE.NAME: UPD_S_RECON_HIST_STG_ERROR

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This source qualifier fetches the record counts, sum of amounts,distinct contracts from all product parts at stage layer which has been aggregated on the basis of S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE.ID and table names.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_SC_STG_SUCCESS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This source qualifier fetches the record counts, sum of amounts and distinct contracts from all product parts error tables at pre-stage layer which has been aggregated on the basis of S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE.ID and table names
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_SC_STG_ERROR

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: A pass through expression between SQ and target
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_COLLECT_PORTS_STG

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This updates STG_COUNT_SUCCESS_NCA STG_COUNT_CA_GENERATED STG_CONTRACTS_SUCCESS HOPM_COUNT_SQ STG_AMOUNT_SUCCESS STG_AMOUNT_CA_GENERATED STG_TP_SUCCESS STG_TP_CA_GENERATED attributes
INSTANCE.NAME: UPD_S_RECONCILIATION_HIST_STG_SUCCESS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Following columns are updated: HOPM_TOTAL_COUNT HOPM_DIST_CONTRACTS HOPM_AMOUNT
INSTANCE.NAME: UPD_S_RECONCILIATION_HIST_HOPM

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: A pass through expression between SQ and target
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_HOPM

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This source qualifier fetches the record counts, sum of amounts,distinct contracts from all product parts at pre-stage layer which has been aggregated on the basis of S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE.ID and table names
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_SC_PBC_PS

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Source Qualifier for S_PBC to stamp contract summary line in the RECON_HIST Table
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_SC_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE_CONTRACT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Source Definition for S_PBC to stamp contract summary line in the RECON_HIST Table
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE_CONTRACT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Source Definition for S_TXN_RECON_HIST to stamp contract summary(Header) line back in the RECON_HIST Table
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_S_TXN_RECON_HIST

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Update Strategy to collect ports and mark them as INSERT
INSTANCE.NAME: UPD_COLLECT_CONTRACT
